n=int(input())
s=[c=='1' for c in input()]
m=len(s)
z=[[0,0]]
for c in s:
 ind = z[-1][c]
 z[-1][c] = len(z)
 z.append(z[ind][:])
assert(len(z) == m+1)
z[m][0] = z[m][1] = m # make it sticky

# how many things match directly
dp = [0 for _ in range(m+1)]
dp[0] = 1
for i in range(n):
 ndp = [0 for _ in range(m+1)]
 for i in range(m+1):
  ndp[z[i][0]] += dp[i]
  ndp[z[i][1]] += dp[i]
 dp = ndp
res = dp[m]

for k in range(1, m):
 s0 = 0
 for c in s[-k:]:
  s0 = z[s0][c]
 dp = [0 for _ in range(m+1)]
 dp[s0] = 1
 for i in range(n - k):
  ndp = [0 for _ in range(m+1)]
  for i in range(m+1):
   ndp[z[i][0]] += dp[i]
   ndp[z[i][1]] += dp[i]
  dp = ndp
 for s1 in range(m): # skip m
  v = dp[s1]
  for c in s[-k:]:
   if s1 == m: v = 0
   s1 = z[s1][c]
  if s1 == m: res += v
print(res)
